de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.quality

Class AbstractKMeansQualityMeasure<O extends NumberVector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.quality.AbstractKMeansQualityMeasure<O>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KMeansQualityMeasure<O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AkaikeInformationCriterion, BayesianInformationCriterion, BayesianInformationCriterionZhao, WithinClusterVarianceQualityMeasure

    public abstract class AbstractKMeansQualityMeasure<O extends NumberVector>
extends java.lang.Object
implements KMeansQualityMeasure<O>
    Base class for evaluating clusterings by information criteria (such as AIC or BIC). Provides helper functions (e.g. max likelihood calculation) to its subclasses.

    References:

    The use of information-theoretic criteria for evaluating k-means was popularized by X-means:

    D. Pelleg, A. Moore
    X-means: Extending K-means with Efficient Estimation on the Number of Clusters
    Proc. 17th Int. Conf. on Machine Learning (ICML 2000)

    A different version of logLikelihood is derived in:

    Q. Zhao, M. Xu, P. Fr√§nti
    Knee Point Detection on Bayesian Information Criterion
    20th IEEE International Conference on Tools with Artificial Intelligence

    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Tibor Goldschwendt, Erich Schubert

      • varianceOfCluster

        public static <V extends NumberVector> double varianceOfCluster(Cluster<? extends MeanModel> cluster,
                                                                NumberVectorDistanceFunction<? super V> distanceFunction,
                                                                Relation<V> relation)
        Variance contribution of a single cluster.

        If possible, this information is reused from the clustering process (when a KMeansModel is returned).

        Type Parameters:
        V - Vector type
        Parameters:
        cluster - Cluster to access
        distanceFunction - Distance function
        relation - Data relation
        Returns:
        Cluster variance
